name: A Small Favor
description:
In A Small Favor, you play as the newest employee of POP UP! Bakery, a brand new bakery opening in the local mall. Meet other mall employees while you're handing out flyers and help them deal with their own problems by playing store-themed Match 3 puzzles. If you help them out, maybe they'll come visit on opening day!

This game was created in one weekend for Wholesome Games Jam 2022! Our first build features 3 NPCs and 3 levels, with the idea that a longer game would feature several different stores, more characters, and increasingly complex puzzles. We're @hexcode_games on Twitter for updates.

--

Controls

Space - advance dialogue

Enter / Click - confirm choice selection

Click to select tiles to swap.
